scripts.export: cd ../circuits/skplg && nargo export && cd ../skplam && nargo export && cd ../skpla && nargo export && cd ../arenalib && nargo export && cd ../skpl && nargo export && cd ../circuit && nargo export && cd ../..
scripts.generate: npm run export && noir-codegen ../circuits/skpl/export/*.json --out-dir ./logic/skpl && noir-codegen ../circuits/arenalib/export/*.json --out-dir ./logic/arenalib && noir-codegen ../circuits/skpla/export/*.json --out-dir ./logic/skpla && noir-codegen ../circuits/skplam/export/*.json --out-dir ./logic/skplam
scripts.noir-profiler: cd ../circuits && cd skpl && nargo export && noir-profiler gates --artifact-path ./export/turn.json --backend-path bb --output ./target -- --include_gates_per_opcode
scripts.bb: cd ../circuits/circuit && nargo compile && nargo e && bb prove -b ./target/skp.json -w ./target/skp.gz -o ./target --verify --scheme ultra_honk && bb write_vk -b ./target/skp.json -o ./target --scheme ultra_honk &&  bb verify -k ./target/vk -p ./target/proof --verbose --scheme ultra_honk
